Subject: Cantera Mass Flow Controllers

Professor Goodwin, 
My company is trying to get aquainted with cantera so that  
we can stop using chemkin, which is exclusively what we use 
at this time for PSR, PFR and equilibrium simulations.  I am very 
familliar with c/c++ and I like the approach that you are using with 
cantera.  I have been trying to setup a kinetics problem utilizing a 
Valve object.  Is there something about its implementation that 
requires something different that MassFlowController objects?  I can 
use these but get a segmentation violation whenever I use a Valve. 
I have checked your documentation but cannot seem to find any 
information that is of help with this subject. 
 
Darin S. Viehe 
Senior Project Engineer / System Administrator 
Combustion Science & Engineering, Inc.
